channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: Charlie struggles with a surprise storm on Vail Pass; Brendan faces pressure after a promotion; Cory's rigging and patience are tested by a heavy manure load.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Backroad Truckers
channel.desc: Dave and his daughter Alyssa struggle to recover a vintage ore cart from an abandoned copper mine; Angela struggles on what should be an easy job, and Dale goes on an epic hunt for furnace oil for Donny's shop.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Backroad Truckers
channel.desc: After Angela accepts a job from Dave, Big Donny lures her away with a better offer; Dave tries to get back at him by buying a truck Donny wanted just so he can flip it to him for a profit; an overworked Junior convinces Craig to go for a joyride.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: So You Think You'd Survive?
channel.desc: What to do when a 7000-pound whale drags you deep into the ocean; how to respond when a raging buffalo charges right at you.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: So You Think You'd Survive?
channel.desc: Testing your instincts against blinding snow, suffocating sand and scorching flames; surviving a raging inferno barreling toward your home; escaping your car if caught in a flash flood and sinking fast.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weather Gone Viral
channel.desc: Dallas residents are caught off guard when a monster tornado spins out of the darkness; Hamburg, N.Y., is hit by a powerful lake-effect snowstorm; a skydiver demonstrates the latest technology.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weather Gone Viral
channel.desc: A freak deluge and a low bridge trap three women in a deadly flash flood; 783 runners trek 156 miles across the Sahara desert for the toughest foot race on Earth; playing catch while falling to Earth at terminal velocity.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weather Gone Viral
channel.desc: The coast of Italy is hit with a monster hail storm; Tropical Storm Imelda stalls, dumping a ton of rain on Texas; a city street is transformed into a raging river when S?o Paulo, Brazil, is pummeled with more than three days of rain.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: America's Weekend Headquarters
channel.desc: The science and stories of weather, plus in-depth forecasts with a focus on weekend weather.

channel.title: America's Weekend Headquarters
channel.desc: The science and stories of weather, plus in-depth forecasts with a focus on weekend weather.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: America's Weekend Headquarters
channel.desc: The science and stories of weather, plus in-depth forecasts with a focus on weekend weather.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weekend Recharge
channel.desc: Though it has "weekend" in the title, this show discusses the week ahead in addition to offering suggestions for what to do on Saturday and Sunday. Weather Channel meteorologists go beyond the elements outside and into the realm of lifestyle tips. Each host has a recurring segment on "Weekend Recharge," which include helping parents get a fresh start to each day and explaining how the weather is expected to impact the weekend's scheduled sports action.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deep Water Salvage
channel.desc: Phil Risko's team at Northstar works fast to refloat a trawler that's been blown onto the shore of a national park in New Jersey; the team improvises to get it back to sea before it suffers further damage.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deep Water Salvage
channel.desc: At the mouth of the Suez Canal, Lino Arosemena and his crew have a monster repair job of removing and refitting a 20-ton propeller.

channel.title: High Arctic Haulers
channel.desc: Thick ice and storms threaten the Arctic Sealift before it reaches its first community.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Captain Greg Turner races a winter storm to save his stranded son, while Mack Kelley navigates unpredictable weather to keep family traditions alive.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Gail's hot streak comes with a target on her back; Greg faces the risks of hauling at night and Lex's issues stack up.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Joe Ray assesses damage in Maine following a winter storm, while restauranteur Susan Povich faces logistical challenges serving lobster in Brooklyn.
